Title: "I am Petrel"
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社) Beijing
Notes: The title of the poster refers to a Russian poem by Maxim Gorky, The Song of the Stormy Petrel (1901). In this allegorical poem, birds discuss the coming tempest (=Revolution). The petrel is the bravest, inviting the tempest to come soon and strike hard.
